name: Hot Artichoke-Pimento Dip
author: KATNIP1208
summary: This is the best hot artichoke dip ever!
ingredients: 2 (8 ounce) cans artichoke hearts, drained and chopped
2 (4 ounce) cans green chile peppers, drained and chopped
1 (4 ounce) jar pimento peppers, drained and chopped
½ (8 ounce) package shredded Monterey Jack cheese
½ cup grated Parmesan cheese, divided
directions: In an oven safe bowl, combine artichoke hearts, chile peppers, pimento peppers, mayonnaise, Monterey Jack cheese and almost all of the Parmesan cheese; sprinkle remaining Parmesan cheese on top
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Bake in preheated oven for 30 minutes, or until lightly browned
